description:
Through binge drinking, junk food, stress and generally not looking after ourselves. ""A virus is simply the excretion of a toxic cell."" meaning, viruses are the result of toxicity and NOT THE CAUSE OF ILLNESS.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
If someone constantly sneezes over you, indeed, this will add to your pre-existing level of toxicity. But if you're clean it will not sicken you. The common cold is common solely because intoxication is common. Give your immune system a chance, switch to a plant-based, high vibe diet and cut out binge drinking - you'll never get sick again.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
""There is no material contagion."" Dr Stefan Lanka.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Further reading: ""Virus mania: how the medical industry continually invents epidemics, making billion dollar profits at our expense."" ""Goodbye Germ Theory, ending a century of medical fraud."" ""What really makes you ill? why everything you thought you knew about disease is wrong."" ""A virus is simply the excretion of a toxic cell."" Rudolf Steiner. Viruses are the result of toxicity and not the cause of illness. ""Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth"" Albert Einstein.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
We must come together! Our civil liberties are being deleted and our livelihoods destroyed by a despotic deep state for ABSOLUTELY NO REASON WHATSOEVER. Other than we live in a fascist system. Please watch all videos on covid truth playlist.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Awaken from the mind control, take back control of your life. Learn about the real science and listen to doctors speaking out about what's truly happening. 
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
""All great truths begin as blasphemies."" George Bernard Shaw
